EmailTemplate.description: this template is used to send to end user when his approval got rejected
EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Rejection email template
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Account – Request Denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your registration request for {!Contact.IAM_Account_Name__c} has been denied. The reason for denial is {!Contact.IAM_Reject_Reason__c}. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINS™ or your Cummins account representative. This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
